demos.message: Book me a flight to New York
demos.reasoning: The user is requesting to make a travel arrangement, specifically a flight to New York, which indicates they want to book or reserve a seat on a plane.

demos.message: I want to cancel my subscription
demos.reasoning: The user is expressing a desire to cancel their subscription, which implies they no longer wish to continue a service they are currently paying for. This is a clear indication of an intent to stop or terminate an ongoing payment or service agreement.
